test.name: distinct_count_aggregation_comparison
test.query: SELECT uniqExact(Title), uniqExact(Title BY UserID % {group_scale}), uniqExact(Title TOTALS) FROM test.hits GROUP BY CounterID % 13, UserID % {group_scale} FORMAT Null
SELECT uniqExact(Title) OVER (PARTITION BY CounterID % 13, UserID % {group_scale}), uniqExact(Title) OVER (PARTITION BY UserID % {group_scale}), uniqExact(Title) OVER () FROM test.hits FORMAT Null
SELECT uniqExact(Title) FROM test.hits GROUP BY GROUPING SETS((CounterID % 13, UserID % {group_scale}), (CounterID % 13),()) FORMAT Null
